# SEQ29 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 29 focuses on let the structure grow directly from your plans and your conception of the buildings

## Category
Construction

## Patterns
apl205, apl206, apl207, apl208

## Emergent Phenomena
Structural systems that grow naturally from the spatial organization rather than imposing a grid

## Overview
This sequence contains 4 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
